1. [City Council](https://cityofkilgore.com/249/City-Council)
2. Alan VanDoren

Alan VanDoren
=============

Term: 2 Years
-------------

Alan and his family moved to Kilgore in 2008 when he accepted a position at LeTourneau University.  They have become involved in many areas of the community.  He and his wife have owned and operated Downtown D'Lights Café since 2012.  As a former State Trooper, he is a supporter of law enforcement and fire and rescue operations.  Currently, Alan works as a flight instructor and check airman for Metro Aviation in Shreveport, LA. Alan and his wife, Debbie, have eight children and 25 grandchildren.

Alan Vandoran attended Thomas Edison State College where he graduated with a Bachelors in Aviation Studies. He then went on to receive a Masters degree  in Commercial Aviation from Delta State University.

* Committee Member for Boy Scout Troop 252 - Kilgore
* Kilgore Historical Preservation Foundation Member
* Texas Shakespeare Festival Guild Member
